thread.title: Dear The Lakers: Have You Seen These Tweets?
thread.title_full: Dear The Lakers: Have You Seen These Tweets?

author: Tom Ley
title: Dear The Lakers: Have You Seen These Tweets?
text:
Photo credit: AP/Nick Ut 
The Los Angeles Lakers just named Magic Johnson their president of basketball operations and fired longtime GM Mitch Kupchak. Co-owner Jim Buss has also been relieved of his decision-making duties, and the team now effectively belongs to Magic. This may work out great for the Lakers! These tweets arenâ€™t very encouraging, though: 
Wait, not all of the tweets are bad: 
If Magic Johnson acquires good players, the Los Angeles Lakers will win more basketball games! Recommended Stories
